exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat y : Z Unable to unify "multZ (neg (S ?M1384)) ?M1385 = addZ (multZ (neg ?M1384) ?M1385) (oppZ ?M1385)" with "multZ match n with | 0 => OZ | S m => neg m end y = addZ (multneg y n) y".

original: intros x y. induction x as [| n | n]. - simpl. apply addZ_eq1. - simpl. apply tech_mult_posZ. - simpl. apply tech_mult_negZ.
